attributes.action: Clearly state if the leading members of the 2012 Olympic committee will, as a result of separate business interests arising from the games, make significants amouts of money, viz in excess of one million pounds.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That those people who were concerned in bringing the 2012 Olympic Games to the UK must be required to declare their separate business interests connected to that event. This will include being a pundit for media companies or any other company providing goods or services to facilitate the Games in any way whatsoever. Furthermore, this information must be made available to the public and its existance publicised.
